titles.title: Restore Coast Guard Capabilities Act
Restore Coast Guard Capabilities Act
A bill to allow the Coast Guard to consider the impacts of Hurricane Michael for the purpose of modifying contracts for offshore patrol cutters.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Restore Coast Guard Capabilities Act
This bill authorizes the U.S. Coast Guard to take into account the impacts of Hurricane Michael for the purpose of modifying the contract to construct offshore patrol cutters if it facilitates national security.
